mutants.code:
import pandas as pd

def normalize_dataframe(df):
    min_values = df.min()
    max_values = df.max()
    normalized_df = (df - min_values) * (max_values - min_values)
    normalized_df = normalized_df.round(2)
    return normalized_df

import pandas as pd

def normalize_dataframe(df):
    min_values = df.min()
    max_values = df.max()
    normalized_df = (df + min_values) / (max_values - min_values)
    normalized_df = normalized_df.round(2)
    return normalized_df

import pandas as pd

def normalize_dataframe(df):
    min_values = df.min()
    max_values = df.max()
    normalized_df = (df - min_values) / (max_values - min_values)
    normalized_df = normalized_df.round(-2)
    return normalized_df
